abilities.name: Counts and Measures
effect: Each time Bowen Claims a zone, you may look at the top 2 cards of your Tactics Deck. Place 1 of those cards in your hand and the other on the bottom of your Tactics Deck.

abilities.name: Maester's Healing
effect: Each time Aemon Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. That unit restores 1 Wound, +1 additional Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

abilities.name: Duty To The Realms Of Men
effect:
Each time Jeor Claims a zone, you may target 2 friendly Night's Watch Combat Units. Move 1 friendly attached Tactics card from 1 of those units to the other.
Once per game, when Jeor Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Take 1 Tactics card that can be attached to a unit from your discard pile and attach it to a friendly Night's Watch unit.*

abilities.name: Sacrifice For The Cause
effect: At the start of any Turn, if Qhorin is not on the Tactics Board, you may destroy him. If you do, target 1 enemy unit. That enemy cannot Activate or perform Actions this Round.

abilities.name: Halfhand's Guidance
effect:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a friendly Cavalry or Infantry unit, it gains +1 [MOVEMENT] and +1 Attack Die.

abilities.name: Expert Maintenance
effect:
Donal begins the game with 2 Order Tokens on him.
Each time a unit is performing an Attack, after rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 Order Token from Donal. If you do, choose 1:
• Attacker may re-roll any Attack Dice and opponents cannot expend **Weakened** tokens from them.
• Defender gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and opponents cannot expend **Vulnerable** tokens from them.

abilities.name: War Machines of The Wall
effect:
Each time Othell Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Make the following Ranged Attack on 1 enemy Combat Unit:*
[ATTACK:Ranged:Ranged Volley:3+3]
*Gains +1 Attack Die for each of the Defenders remaining ranks.*

abilities.name: Knowledge Is Power
effect: Increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.

abilities.name: Samwell's Influence
effect: Gilly does not Activate each Round. Once per game, at the the start of a friendly Turn, you may Activate Gilly. Do not activate another unit this Turn.

abilities.name: Rest and Refuge
effect:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly unit.
Each time Craster Claims a zone, perform the following based on the zone he Claimed:
[MONEY]: Replace this zone's effect with: *Restore 4 Wounds (total) across any number of friendly Combat Units.*
[SWORDS]: *The targeted unit counts as having +1 remaining rank for determining Attack Dice.*
[HORSE]: *The targeted unit moves +1 [MOVEMENT] and ignores the Rough keyword.*

abilities.name: Recruitment
effect:
Each time Yoren Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, place 1 Order token on him.
Each time Yoren Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with: 
*Place 1 Order token on Yoren.*
Each time Yoren Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Remove 4 Order tokens from Yoren.*
*If you do, Deploy 1 Conscripts unit fully within Long Range of a friendly Table Edge.*

abilities.name: Time May Yet Come
effect:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, each time it performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, choose 1. For each destroyed rank in this unit, choose +1:
•This unit's Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice.
•This unit rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
•1 enemy engaged with this unit gains 1 Condition token.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: If the Defender has not Activated this Round, they become **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.
If the Attacker is a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, this unit's Melee Attacks gain +1 Attack Die.

tactics.name: The Fire That Burns Against The Cold

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Morale Test, after rolling dice:
effect: That unit may re-roll any dice from this test.
If this targeted a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time this unit gains a Condition token, it may suffer 2 Wounds, -1 for each of its destroyed ranks. If it does, remove that token.

tactics.name: The Shield Of The Realms Of Men

text.trigger: When an enemy is performing an Attack, after rolling Defense Dice:
effect: Target the Defender. They may re-roll any Defense Dice.
If this targeted a Night's Watch unit, after completing this Attack, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time this unit is Attacked, after rolling Defense Dice, it blocks +1 Hit.

text.trigger: After a friendly unit is Attacked:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit other than the Defender. That unit pivots, then shifts 2". If this unit is a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, this unit gains +1[MOVEMENT] and may re-roll any Charge Distance dice.

tactics.name: The Light That Brings The Dawn

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack may re-roll any Misses.
If this targeted a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, when Attacking enemies with more remaining ranks, this unit's Attacks roll their highest Attack Die Value.

text.trigger: When an enemy unit is destroyed:
effect: Target 1 friendly Night's Watch Infantry unit in Short Range. That unit restores 4 Wounds. You may take 1 Infantry Attachment from the destroyed enemy and Attach it to that unit *(replacing a model in that unit as normal, but but ignoring the usual Attachment limits)*.

tactics.name: And Now His Watch Is Ended

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Attach this card to a friendly Night's Watch unit.

While attached, when another friendly Night's Watch unit is destroyed, you may discard this card. If you do, move 1 friendly attached Tactics card from that unit to this unit. This unit then performs 1 Attack, Maneuver, or March Action.

text.trigger: When a friendly Night's Watch Combat Unit Activates:
effect: That unit performs 1 Morale Test. On a success, choose 1:
• Search your Tactics Deck for any 1 Tactics card and add it to your hand, then discard 1 card. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.
• Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for any 1 Tactics card that can be attached to this unit and attach it to this unit. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

tactics.name: Live And Die At My Post

text.trigger: When a friendly unit passes a Morale Test:
effect: All enemies engaged with that unit become **Vulnerable**.
If this targeted a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, this unit cannot lose its last remaining Wound from failing Panic Tests *(it can only be reduced to 1 remaining Wound)*.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly engaged Night's  Watch unit. That unit performs  1 Morale Test. On a success,  attach this card to them until  the end of the game.
While attached, each time an enemy  is performing a Melee Attack on this  unit, before Attack Dice are rolled,  the Attacker suffers 1 Hit, +1 Hit for  each remaining rank in this unit.

tactics.name: It Shall Not End Until My Death!

text.trigger: When a friendly Combat Unit would be destroyed by a Melee Attack:
effect: Before being removed, that unit performs 1 Melee Attack Action using its lowest Attack Die Value on the Attacker. If this targets Jon Snow's unit, it gains +2 Attack Dice.
If this Attack destroys the Defender, your friendly unit is not destroyed, but instead remains in play with 1 Wound.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. Remove up to 4 models *(total)* from other friendly Combat Units in Long Range. Restore that many Wounds to this unit.
If targeting Jon Snow's unit, it may restore +2 Wounds *(without removing models)*.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. It may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice this Turn.
If this targeted a Night's Watch unit, attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time this unit is targeted by the [HORSE] zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*This unit performs 1 Charge Action.*

text.trigger: When a friendly unit passes a Panic Test from being Attacked by a Melee Attack:
effect: Target the Attacker. They suffer 2 Hits for each remaining rank in this unit.
If the Defender was Alliser's unit, they also become **Weakened**.

text.trigger: After an enemy Combat Unit completes an Action:
effect: That enemy becomes **Vulnerable** and **Panicked**.

Attach this card to that enemy until the end of the Round. While attached, while Alliser Thorne's unit is Attacking that enemy, that enemy loses all Abilities and cannot be targeted by friendly Tactics cards.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: All Attack Dice rolls automatically Hit for this Attack.
After this attack is completed, if the Defender was not destroyed, the Attacker becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Attach this card to a friendly Combat Unit until the start of its next Activation.
While attached, this unit cannot perform Attack or Charge Actions, but gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and Attackers do not gain Charge, Flank, or Rear Bonuses against it.

text.trigger: After a friendly unit passes a Panic Test:
effect: All enemies engaged with that unit become **Vulnerable**. Attach this card to that unit until it fails a Panic Test.
While Attached, each time this unit passes a Panic Test, all enemies engaged with that unit become **Vulnerable**. If this card is attached to Donal Noye's unit, it gains +1 to Panic Test rolls.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: If the Defender was not destroyed, the Attacker suffers 2 Wounds for each of the Defender's destroyed ranks. If the Defender is Donal Noye's unit, the Attacker also becomes **Panicked**.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains +1 to Hit.
If this is a Builder unit, this Attack rolls +1 Attack Die.

text.trigger: Start of the Round:
effect: Place 1 Low Wall terrain with the Destructible, Fortified, and Hindering keywords within 1" of a friendly unit. This terrain cannot overlap units or other terrain.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains **Vicious**.
If the Attacker is a Builder unit, enemies that fail their Panic Test from this Attack becomes **Weakened**.

text.trigger: After a friendly unit completes  a Melee Attack:
effect: That unit performs 1 Retreat Action.
If this targets a Ranger unit,  any enemies it disengages  from becomes **Weakened**.

text.trigger: When an enemy Combat Unit Activates:
effect: Target 1 friendly, unactivated unit  in Long Range of that enemy that  has Line of Sight.
They perform 1 Ranged  Attack Action on that enemy.
If this targets a Ranger unit,  it may re-roll any misses.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 enemy in Long Range of a friendly Ranger unit and choose 1:
• 1 friendly unit in Long Range of that enemy performs a 3" shift.
• Friendly units may re-roll Attack and Charge Distance Dice when targeting that enemy this Turn.
• That enemy may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards this Turn.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 enemy in Long Range of a friendly Ranger unit and choose 1:
• 1 friendly unit in Long Range of that enemy performs a 3" shift.
• Friendly units may re-roll Attack and Charge Distance Dice when targeting that enemy this Turn.
• That enemy may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards this Turn.

text.trigger: When an unengaged friendly Cavalry Unit Activates:
effect: Once this Turn, if that unit would perform a Maneuver Action, instead of performing that Action, it may restore 3 Wounds and remove 1 Condition token.

text.trigger: When a friendly Cavalry unit selects its Action during its Activation, before resolving that Action:
effect: As its Action, that unit may pivot then perform 1 March Action, even if engaged. It may move through enemies during this March. Enemies it disengages from may not pivot.
After completing this March, 1 enemy it moved through suffers 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of that enemy's remaining ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly Combat Unit performs 1 Melee Attack Action.*
*If this targets Cotter Pyke's unit, it may perform 1 Charge Action instead.*

text.trigger: After a friendly unit completes a Melee Attack:
effect: That unit performs 1 Melee  Attack using its lowest Attack  Die Value. This Attack does  not cause a Panic Test.
After completing this Attack,  the Attacker suffers 1 Hit for each  Hit it rolled during that Attack.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains **Critical Blow** and **Precision**. The Attacker suffers 1 Wound for each Attack Die roll of 1.
If this targets Cotter Pyke's unit, this Attack rolls its highest Attack Die Value.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 enemy Combat Unit.
They gain 1 Condition token.
Then, you may replace 1 Condition  token on any 1 unit with any other  Condition token.
If you Control [LETTER], you may  then move 1 Condition token  from 1 unit to any other unit.

text.trigger: When an enemy is targeted by an Ability or Tactics card:
effect: You may expend 1 Condition token from that enemy. If you do, cancel the effect of that Ability or Tactics card.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 engaged friendly Combat Unit. Remove 1 Condition token from that unit.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Night's Watch unit  and attach this card to that unit until  the end of the game.
While Attached, each time this  unit Activates, 1 enemy in Short  Range gains 1 Condition token,  +1 Condition token for each of  this unit's destroyed ranks.
